  • Constructor Details

    • Storage

      public Storage(int id, List<Type_side_connector> connectorList, int capacity, SSTTypes types)
      Constructor for the Storage class, a specialized type of SpaceShipTile that holds goods.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for the storage tile.
      connectorList - A list of connectors associated with the storage tile, defined by the Type_side_connector enumeration.
      capacity - The maximum capacity of goods that can be stored.
      types - The type of the storage tile, based on the SSTTypes enumeration.

  • Method Details

    • getEffectivePresentGoods

      public List<Goods> getEffectivePresentGoods()
      Retrieves the list of goods currently stored in the storage that are considered effective and present. The returned goods must abide by any capacity or value constraints defined in the storage.
      Overrides:
      getEffectivePresentGoods in class SpaceShipTile
      Returns:
      a list of goods that are effectively present in this storage. The list is mutable and reflects the current state of stored goods.

    • getCapacity

      public int getCapacity()
      Retrieves the maximum capacity of goods that can be stored.
      Overrides:
      getCapacity in class SpaceShipTile
      Returns:
      the storage capacity as an integer.

    • addGoods

      public void addGoods(Goods good)
      Adds a specified Goods object to the storage if conditions for storage capacity and goods value are met. If the storage is full or the goods are not eligible for storage, appropriate messages are displayed.
      Overrides:
      addGoods in class SpaceShipTile
      Parameters:
      good - the Goods object to be added to the storage - Goods with a value of 3 or greater cannot be added. - If the storage has no available capacity, the goods will not be added.
